column3:
We came twice in two days ! 
We had a wonderful time in family at Mesa ! The food was amazing, very flavourous, a real testimony to the Khmer cooking culture. 
The team is super mindful and always happy to support ! 
Lovely spot !
This is an excellent restaurant with good service and friendly staff. The food was well presented  and delicious. Our waitress Nancy was excellent.

The lady who greeted us was so kind and welcoming .. the restaurant is beautiful . Food was delicious and we were given free snacks , a free dessert and a free mocktail . We canâ€™t rate her service highly enough . She is learning English and talked to us a lot wished us a happy and safe trip and life . I wish I could remember her name she was such a standout employee . This is a must do in Siem Reap !

Brought my girl here for dinner and she was more than impressed. Ms.Chilli was very sweet and the staff are extremely courteous.
Very good food and hospitality. Loved the vibe. Very friendly staff and loved the presentation. The curries and cocktails were amazing.
